titles.title: Service-Disabled Veteran Opportunities in Small Business Act
Service-Disabled Veteran Opportunities in Small Business Act

A bill to require training for employees of Federal agencies that award less than 3 percent of prime contracts to small business concerns owned and controlled by service-disabled veterans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Service-Disabled Veteran Opportunities in Small Business Act
This bill requires the Small Business Administration to provide training to relevant employees at any federal agency that awards in a fiscal year less than 3% of its prime contracts and subcontracts to small businesses owned by service-disabled veterans.
